channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 20th August
item.description:
CWPH 400 X 300 X 60mm ROAD CLOSURE MARKED AS NUMBER 6 PLUS 2 X NSD (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 20th August
item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 20th August
item.description:
Several branches in lower crown of these trees appear bare and with some visible disease. Customer concerned they may be dead and will fall off.
